verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Didn’t you see the one who denies the religion?
It is he who repulses the orphan.
And doesn’t encourage the feeding of the needy.
So woe to those who pray.
Those who are unmindful in their prayers.
